column5: As you know my wife has been told she has Lung Cancer. Well she has been referred to a Specialist at the cancer clinic here in Hamilton. Now waiting for the appointment as to when???Hoping they are wrong because she does not have any of the symptoms that are associated with this cancer???/
I hope not to Kelvin.  My thoughts are with you and your wife right now.  Please let it be a mistake (fingers crossed).  Joey
Thanks for the update. Waiting can be the hardest thing. Best of luck to you and the Mrs.
Thanks Kevlin.. they sure seem to be dragging their ass on this. A change of venue might be in quick order...
Thanks for the update....crossing my fingers and saying prayers for you both.
I was thinking the same thing. Thanks for the update Kelvin.
thanks for the update kelvin.my thoughtsill be with you both. Iposted earlier but it musta got lost when the site went down. Be strong buddy.  Paul
All our best for the Mrs Kelvin.

All the best to your wife. Hope that they are wrong too. My wife went through a scare a couple of years ago, went through bunch of tests at the cancer clnic and had several follow up visits and found out that the Doc's assumption was wrong,(had me pretty worried for awhile) it does happen. If she is going to Juravinski Cancer Centre she is in good hands.
Best wishes to your wife Kelvin and hopefully they don't keep her waiting too long before they figure things out.
The waiting is brutal.... both my wife and I went through it a couple of years ago (in the same year).  Prayers from our family to yours.
Hey bud, your in my thoughts!! I hope they don't keep her waiting too long... keep on the phone, squeaky wheel and all....
Why they make people wait for this kinda stuff. Thoughts are with you Kelvin and the mrs,s. Lets hope they are wrong.
We are hoping for the best for your missus Kelvin...  Beans and Maribeth
Our thoughts and prayers are with ya Bud!
Hamilton has some great staff. She will be well looked after there. Hoping things go well, kelvin.
all the best to your wife!  We are thinking of you and your family while she battles this.
That`s a tough deal man for sure, my thoughts are with you!
better bookmark this before it gets deleted   http://www.cancertutor.com/Cancer/Laetrile.html   good luck

Hey Kelvin,  MAke sure you only take her to Henderson/Juravinski...  most ambulances take patients to St.Josephs... and that didn't help my grandfather let me tell you...  if you need any help or have any questions , let me know, Andrea is a great resource...
All the best for your wife.
I too am hoping they're wrong Kelvin. Thanks for keeping us up to speed.

so much on my plate as of late I missed this.  I hope they are WRONG and it was a bad scan/test.  I know what the waiting time is like and it SUCKS not knowing!  I'm not the praying kind but I'm sending best wishes your way.
